definition: to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]

sentences.english: Give up little minds of swallows, and hold high aspirations of swans .
sentences.chinese: 棄燕雀之小志，慕鴻鵠而高翔。

sentences.english: Cowherd took a pile at the same time, in the murder case.
sentences.chinese: 在此同時，高翔接手了一樁牛郎被害的案件。

to promote (to official position in former times)
